name: Classic Milk Tea
description: Our Boba Guys Blend No. 1 from Tea People. The staple of boba milk tea.

name: Decaf Black Milk Tea
description: Our Decaf Black from Tea People. A full-bodied black tea without the kick.

name: Jasmine Milk Tea
description: Our Jasmine Green from Tea People. Floral and silky.

name: Rose Black Milk Tea
description: A Ceylon black tea with a sweet fullness of delicate young rosebuds and petals.

name: Hong Kong Milk Tea
description: A robust but sweet premium loose leaf black tea blended with condensed milk.

name: Espresso Milk Tea
description: Bold and shaken espresso and black tea.

name: Strawberry Fields
description: Your choice of milk layered over our housemade strawberry puree.

name: Ube Latte
description: Light and airy - housemade ube puree with coconut milk and a touch of cardamom.

name: Thai Tea
description: Brewed from Ceylon green tea and combined with dairy milk and condensed milk.

name: Korean Banana Milk
description: Creamy and uniquely sweet - our take on Korea's Banana Milk. Housemade banana jam paired with oat milk.

name: Dirty Banana Milk
description: Creamy and uniquely sweet - our take on Korean Banana Milk with a shot of espresso from Proyecto Diaz.

name: Horchata
description: Housemade with rice milk, cinnamon, sugar and a splash of almond milk for taste.
